text.__SUMMARY__: Hypericum xylosteifolium is a flowering plant in the St. John's wort family, Hypericaceae. It is the only species in Hypericum sect. Inodora.
text.Distribution: The species is found in northeast Turkey and southwest Georgia.
text.Description:
The species grows up to 1.5 meters tall. Its petals are golden yellow and its seeds are pale tan.
